long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A job application tracker extension for simplifying the job search. 
The users can save the following details of their job applications in the browser extension:
Job ID, Job Title, Company Name, Location, Job Link, Upload resume and save the application status (applied, interview, offer, rejected).
The users can update their application details from the list using the auto-generated application number, and save their changes.
The users can also delete the job application they want to, using the respective auto-generated application number. The application number order will be updated and maintained.
At the bottom of the popup, users can see the total number of applications they have saved, thus helping speed up or track their application progress.
